original: 而後兩軍相持不下，曹操聽聞袁軍烏巢糧倉欠缺時，派出輕騎襲擊，焚毀糧草，使袁軍喪失鬥志，進而擊潰主力。
text: Then the two armies were at a standstill. When Cao Cao heard that Yuan Jun's Wuchao granary was lacking, he sent Qingqi to attack and burned the grain and grass, causing Yuan Jun to lose his fighting spirit and defeat the main force.
